case: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided
quoteText:
List of cookies used

Below is a list of the cookies we set on our websites and the purpose of each:

fastmail.com
  • s_... – Login cookie – this is used to allow you to log in to the Website.
  • f_... – Security cookie – used as part of login and account recovery for keeping your account secure.
  • d_... – Stores the domain you came in with, so we can keep you on the same domain when you log out.
  • lang_... – Your preferred language to use for our interface once logged in.
  • theme_... – Your preferred theme to use for our interface once logged in.
  • campaign – If you came to our marketing site via a particular ad or campaign on a third party site, we set this so we can measure how effective the campaign was.
fastmailusercontent.com
  • sk_… Login cookie – this is used to authenticate your requests for message attachments and other user content.
topicbox.com
  • s_... – Login cookie – this is used to allow you to log in to the Website.
  • f_... – Security cookie – used as part of login and account recovery for keeping your account secure.
pobox.com
  • pobox_session — Login cookie – this is used to allow you to log in to the Website.
  • browsertoken — Security cookie – used as part of login and account recovery for keeping your account secure.
  • SpryMedia_DataTables_... — Used for temporary storage of view parameters for data views (no user data)
listbox.com
  • mason — Login cookie – this is used to allow you to log in to the Website.

case: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
quoteText:
Third Party analytics. We have engaged Innocraft's Matomo to analyse the activities of visitors to the Website through the use of cookies and other tracking technologies which enable them to monitor traffic to, and use of the Website. This enables us to evaluate usage of the Website. These third party cookies are governed by each third party's privacy or cookies policy.

Third party analytics are only used on our marketing and help pages.
